title: pckf.com
content:
Heads up:
Just found out that the domain forwarding service used for www.pckf.com has problems working with the Safari (Mac) web browser. (Thanks, Grafix!)
I've switched to another forwarding service, so all should work fine.
There's a small, very unlikely potential for some downtime over the next 48 hours. I'm sorry if this happens while you're using it. If you've forgotten the full address when it's down, search PCKF in google, it's the top result.

Speaking of PCKF on Google, I'd also like to thank whoever added PCKF to these:
[url=http://acronyms.thefreedictionary.com/PCKF]acronyms.thefreedictionary.com/PCKF[/url]
[url=http://www.acronymfinder.com/af-query.asp?Acronym=PCKF]www.acronymfinder.com/af-...ronym=PCKF[/url]
Very Keen of you.

title: Re: pckf.com
content:
Hey, cool! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

I didn't know PCKF means something other than "Partially-Conditioned Kalman Filter" too. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]

No idea who has added those, but I think it just might be Retord8. That's just a guess, naturally.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: pckf.com
content:
